text: Bradley Hall (born 16 November 1990) is a British bobsledder. He competed in both the two-man event and the four-man event at the 2018 Winter Olympics. == Career results == ===Olympic Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- " !Event !style="width:70px;"|Two-man !style="width:70px;"|Four- man |- !
